\begin{question}
whether each of the following is a declaration or a
definition:
\begin{enumerate}[label=(\alph*)]
^^I\item \verb|extern int ix = 1024;|
^^I\item \verb|int iy;|
^^I\item \verb|extern int iz;|
\end{enumerate}
\end{question}
